text: @realDonaldTrump #Trump trying to convince Americans you have not mishandled response to #COVID19. Were it true it would be great. But, your Tweet is nothing but lies. What are the numbers? Scientists are NOT VERY promising re vaccine this year. What other solutions? Clorox? #TrumpLiesPeopleDie
